text: They Conquer the Skies () is a 1963 Soviet drama film directed by Tatyana Lioznova.Девять мгновений Татьяны Лиозновой«К бриллиантам равнодушна». Светлана Светличная о счастье в кино и в жизни == Plot == The film tells about a pilot named Alexei Kolchin, who had the honor of being the first to launch a jet plane and test him. The first launch was excellent, but during the modernization of the aircraft, the engine exploded, causing Alexei to die. His friend Sergey Sharov, based on the recommendations of Alexey, makes the second launch...Им покоряется небо == Cast == * Nikolay Rybnikov as Kolchin * Vladimir Sedov as Sharov * Svetlana Svetlichnaya"Не виноватая я...Он сам пришел": Светлане Светличной исполнилось 79 лет as Nina Kolchina * Yevgeny Yevstigneev as Main designer * Oleg Zhakov as Basargin * Lev Barashkov as The undisciplined pilot discharged of flight tests. * Sergei Blinnikov * Georgiy KulikovИм покоряется небо (1963) Full Cast & Crew == References == == External links == * Category:1963 films Category:Russian-language films Category:Soviet drama films Category:Soviet films
title: They Conquer the Skies
